entries.title: Added AI Security and Ethics & Policy tabs
entries.detail: Introduced AI Security and Ethics & Policy briefs, cross-tab deduplication to prevent repeated stories across tabs, AI relevance filtering to reduce off-topic content, and priority-based story selection (Security → Global → UK → others).

entries.title: Added tabbed daily briefs
entries.detail: Introduced tabbed layout for UK AI, AI & Business, AI & Work, and Global AI with per-tab feed pools and separate seen caches.
